mapper.select: with temp_date AS ( select * from sg_assigncycle where group_id = #{ group_id } and now() between date(startdate) and date(enddate) ) select A.user_id , B.penalty , count(*) AS log_count , B.penalty <= count(*) AS penalty_chk from studylogs A left join studygroup B on A.group_id = B.group_id left join temp_date C on C.group_id = A.group_id where A.create_date between date(C.startdate) AND date(C.enddate) group by user_id, B.penalty, C.assigncycle
